ActionBar_NewBrowsingStructureCmd.Title: New Browsing Structure
ActionBar_NewBrowsingStructureCmd.LongHe: Select Browsing Structures section and click this command to create a Browsing Structure.
ActionBar_NewBrowsingNodeCmd.Title: New Browsing Node
ActionBar_NewBrowsingNodeCmd.LongHelp: Select a Browsing Structure or Browsing Node and click this command to create a Browsing Node.
RenameCmd_BrowsingStructure.Title: Rename
RenameCmd_BrowsingStructure.LongHelp: Select a Browsing Structure and click this command to rename it. The rename action can be triggered by clicking on the title of Browsing Structure.
RenameCmd_BrowsingNode.Title: Rename
RenameCmd_BrowsingNode.LongHelp: Select a Browsing Node and click this command to rename it. The rename action can be triggered by clicking on the title of Browsing Node.
Copy.Title: Copy
Copy.ShortHelp: Copies the selected content in the Browsing Node or Browsing Structure.
Paste.Title: Paste
Paste.ShortHelp: Pastes the copied or cut content in the Browsing Node or Browsing Structure.
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.Title: Copy Link
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.ShortHelp: Copy the Browsing Node or Browsing Structure link to the clipboard.
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.LongHelp:
The command will copy the Browsing Node or Browsing Structure link to the clipboard and allow you to share it with others.

Please note that access to the Browsing Node or Browsing Structure requires that your recipient has a 3DPassport, license and appropriate credentials.
findInTree.Title: Find
findInTree.ShortHelp: Searches for a Browsing Node or a Browsing Structure inside the tree and expands the structure to a specific Browsing element.
findInTree.LongHelp: If there are multiple instances, all the instances are expanded and highlighted.
Information.Title: Information
Information.ShortHelp: Opens the Information panel, and provides information about the selected objects like their properties (for example, their maturity state or owner).
Information.LongHelp: You can edit the properties of the objects from the Properties tab. Depending on the type of the selected objects, other tabs are available.
ColumnVisibility.Title: Table Preferences
ColumnVisibility.ShortHelp: Customizes the presentation of the tree display.
tree-filter.Title: Filter
tree-filter.ShortHelp: Filter the root objects in the web app
tree-filter.LongHelp: Select the available options to filter the root objects of the structures.
alphaSortingContainer.Title: Sort
alphaSortingContainer.ShortHelp: Lets you rearrange the browsing structure or browsing node.
alphaSortingContainer.LongHelp: Select the available options to sort objects of the structures.
